title: The Big Happy
description: Leaving a comfortable career as a TV producer while waiting for his novel to sell, David finds his life falling apart and takes on work as a downmarket DJ to pay his bills, a situation complicated as his best friend Annie prepares to marry "Rat Boy," his bachelor pals are settling down, he falls in love with an unstable younger woman, and cool Zach harbors a secret that could destroy them all. 25,000 first printing.
author: Scott Mebus
